DOC.brief_title: Increasing Spontaneous Non-exercise Activity ( The Sitting Study )
DOC.criteria: Sedentary lifestyle 5 % weight loss within past 2 month Active job lifestyle Participation exercise program Pregnant and/or lactate Uncontrolled hypertension Alcohol drug abuse Presence acute illness Major limitation physical movement
